    • processRequestNew

      public void processRequestNew(List<String> httpRequests, List<HttpClient> httpClients)
      Takes httprequests and clients sends them async, when client sends request, client goes back to queue. HttpRequest then removed from synchronized list. Received Response of html page then is saved to file system.
      Parameters:
      httpRequests -
      httpClients -

    • singleThreadedScrapingNew

      public void singleThreadedScrapingNew(List<String> requests, List<HttpClient> httpClients)
      Takes request and clients and loops in while loop while requests lists is not empty in while loop clients and requests are processed with processRequestNew method.
      Parameters:
